  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085882</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Learning to look at art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernen, kunst zu betrachten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude pour regarder l'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem olhar a arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparare guardare arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκμάθηση να εξετάζει την τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aprender mirar arte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Strategies for helping students develop visual literacy in looking at paintings and other forms of visual art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strategien für helfende Kursteilnehmer entwickeln
Sichtbildungsgrad, wenn sie Anstriche und andere Formulare der 
Sichtkunst betrachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les stratégies pour les étudiants aidants 
développent l'instruction visuelle en regardant des peintures et 
d'autres formes d'art visuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As estratégias para estudantes de ajuda 
desenvolvem o literacy visual em olhar pinturas e outros formulários 
da arte visual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le strategie per gli allievi d'assistenza 
sviluppano il literacy visivo nel guardare le pitture ed altre forme 
dell'arte visiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές για τους σπουδαστές να αναπτύξουν την 
οπτική βασική εκπαίδευση στην εξέταση τα έργα ζωγραφικής και 
άλλες μορφές της εικαστηκής τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las estrategias para los estudiantes que ayudan 
desarrollan la instrucción visual en mirar pinturas y otras formas de
arte visual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
